name: Magical Sound Car
description:
There's a new toy in the town!

The Magical Sound Car is a little car that can run, jump... and plays music while is moving! The kids made courses for the toy and challenge you to beat all them. Simple reach the kids to beat the level and go to the next! This game features:

- Simple controls that anybody can enjoy;
- 60 stages to beat;
- Cute pixel art all in black & white;
- Variety in traps, gimmicks and elements;
- Original chiptune music composed by myself!

If you download and play this game, the kids will be very happy and me too! This is my first game that I finished making and I would be very happy for any feedback and suggestions :D

NOTE#1: You MUST pause the game to save.
NOTE#2: Playing this game in fullscreen mode is recommended. There's a bug that may occurs while playing in windowed mode that I wasnt able to figure out yet. If you open the game and only hear the music and the screen is all white, please go to windowed mode (alt+enter) then go back to full screen (alt+enter again). I'd be very happy if you report me back bugs and issues to my twitter/gmail (@manoelpdb)!
